meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rachel Pepe Michael Brady Todd Lovell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7052.

td.p: Rachel Pepe, an operations manager from St. Louis, Missouri
Michael Brady, a user experience designer from Norwood, Massachusetts
Todd Lovell, an engineering manager from Carmel, Indiana (whose 1-day cash winnings total $26,401)

tr.td: THE BIGGEST LOSER
COUNTRIES' HIGHEST POINTS
SHELL GAME
HODGEPODGE
A SENSE OF STYLE
THERE'S AN ANIMAL IN MY DICTIONARY

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
